You can now find Appcelerator documentation at https://docs.axway.com/. This site will be taken down in the near future.

Hyperloop 2.1.2 - 27 June 2017

Hyperloop 2.1.2 is a patch release that includes two bug fixes.

Fixed issues

  • TIMOB-24834 - Android: Duplicate resource error with multiple app_name definitions

  • TIMOB-24800 - Hyperloop: Android - aar not working in 2.1.0 anymore, it can't find R$style
